title: ESRC and GADC Drone Training

title: World Engineering Day for Sustainable Development 2025
description: The Electronic Systems Research Center opened its doors for an informative open house as part of the World Engineering Day for Sustainable Development. Students from various courses had the chance to explore the center and engage with the innovative work taking place across different disciplines of engineering.
alt: Engineering Students from various courses exploring and learning about what ESRC is
